title: Ghost in the Shell VR Adventures Let You Stay Home with the Major
description: Explore Shibuya, go on a scavenger hunt, and download your own TachikomaGet away from it all with the Major! A new series of virtual and augmented reality features for Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 are coming to you free from Netflix. Explore Motoko Kusanagi's…
